name: Impossible Multi Bike Stunts 2
description:
Race your motorbike through each tricky level to reach your goal. Feel like a racer in this amazing simulation. If you want to participate in this racing you have to choose your favorite motorbike before to starts the race. Every level is different from previous one and a little bit tough to finish the level. Complete your mission or you may lose and will have to start the mission again.
Feature:

- Real life motorbiking experience.
- Simple and easy graphics.
- Different camera angles make it more thrilling!
- Multiple challenging levels.
- Smooth and easy controls to make your race easy.
- Lots of vehicles with unique upgrades.
